mainSequence.step: The Logged-in User clicks on "+ add order" under "recurring transactions"
The GUI Fin. Acc. Details View opens the Recurring Transaction Order Create Form
The Logged-in User enters recurring transaction order details
The GUI Recurring Transaction Order Create Form creates a new recurring transaction order based on user inputs
The Server inserts the new recurring transaction order into the database
The GUI Recurring Transaction Order Create Form reloads the view
